name: MagicBus
headline: We make vanpool simple.
description:
Our mission is to take cars off the road by making it safe and easy to vanpool in the post Covid world.

A vanpool is a group of people who commute together, usually in a shared van. It’s an excellent, cost effective way to commute, used by hundreds of thousands of Americans, but the industry is largely offline. It’s difficult to find, join, and start vanpools. 

We build software that fixes this, making vanpooling simple and flexible. We believe that in a post Covid world, it will be more important than ever to rethink shared transportation and make it more adaptive.

Our customers are organizations like transit agencies and employers who have existing vanpool fleets. We provide these customers with our SaaS platform that manages their vanpool programs. We capture real time information about open seats, then make those seats available to book through our app. We also make it easy for people to crowdsource and start new vanpools.

generated_description:
**MagicBus: Revolutionizing Vanpooling**

MagicBus makes vanpooling simple. In a world moving towards smarter transportation solutions post-COVID, their mission is pretty straightforward: take cars off the road by offering a safe and easy way to vanpool. 

So, what is vanpooling? It's essentially a group of people commuting together in a shared van—a cost-effective alternative that’s been underutilized because the industry largely operates offline. Finding or starting a vanpool has always been a hassle. Here’s where MagicBus comes in. They’ve built software specifically designed to streamline the vanpooling process. This SaaS platform allows organizations—like transit agencies and employers with existing vanpool fleets—to manage their programs effectively. It collects real-time data on open seats and enables users to easily book those seats through their app. Plus, it offers the flexibility for users to crowdfund new vanpools as demand arises.

Founded in Los Angeles and a graduate of Y Combinator's W16 batch, MagicBus has a small but dedicated team of 18 people. They're passionate about adapting shared transportation to meet modern needs, believing that the post-pandemic landscape makes their mission even more critical.

For organizations looking to innovate their transportation methods, MagicBus offers a compelling solution. To explore more, check out their website at [magicbus.io](http://www.magicbus.io). 

With transportation tagged as a key part of their identity, MagicBus is embracing the future of commuting—one vanpool at a time.
